S.FORM: luye guan ('inamizukuan: shikano, pinairangan: Lo k iá hiong, nginaingayngan: Luk Ia Hiong Lu k yâ hiông) imaza i pasakacedas a vecekadan tua taiwan a taituking, a i viri ciul mavan a guansan cen, a pasamaza i ledepan i viri kicencen nakipuljaqedi ta haydan gu, a i tjaikacedas mavan a dunghe, a i tjaikaledep kata pasanavalj nakicaing tua i yanping. tucu i luye guan izua alu kuzulj a caucau, a pairang qevas 40 , a haka qevas 30 , a ilizulizuk a kacalisian qevas 20 , a zuma a caucau qevas 10 , izua mare maljimalji a zuku au natemalidu a kudakudan. pakata kinapangaljan a paljavak, izua luye, lungtien, yungan, rilung, riyan, rihe, rivung a matapitju a mula qinaljan. aza nugiu qevas qemuma izua 70 , avan nu nugiuan a qinaljan. cinalivatan aicu a luye ka cinting a djiday sipavecik a paljavak ta pakuangsiang a kicapilj. ka ripunanga a djiday pavalitan ta taidu ting guansan djin luye zuang , kapuamin a maqaqeci pavalitan ta luye guan, ljakua aza a parikunghu sa kanrivi, izua sanye , zungye , siaye sipavecik a tjemevetjevelj a masan lusan mula, au sipaljavak ta yanping guan. izua drusa a
